summary: This mod adds more quests to the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
Mod:  Readme - Mages College Quests 1_0
Game:  TES V: Skyrim
Author:  Freddy the Noob\'s Mod Team                                     
Date:  5/20/12                   
************************************************************************
CONTENTS                          
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD           
************************************************************************
	   This mod adds more quests to the College of Winterhold.

	   To start the new quests, join the College of Winterhold and speak to Ajira in the Hall
of Countenance living quarters of the college.  You can do these quests before, during, or after 
the main questline of the college.

	   These quests are inspired by (directly ripped off from) the Mages Guild quests in 
Morrowind. 

	   This mod uses voiced dialog.

	   Morrowind did not have quest markers and it did just fine without them.  So this mod 
does not use quest markers either.

	   At this point, the mod just adds two new quests.

	   If you thought that the College of Winterhold quests were a bit disappointing because 
they were too short and did not add enough hours of play time to the game, then this mod could 
help a bit.	    
************************************************************************
2. Installation                           
************************************************************************
           Extract (decompress) the .esp and the .bsa to your Skyrim directory.  
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to \"Wild Goose Chase Quest.esp\" in your mod manager.
 
           Alternately, extract files someplace else.  Then move the .esp and .bsa 
to Skyrim\\Data.  Mark the box next to the plugin in your mod manager.
************************************************************************
3. Version History    
************************************************************************
V 0.5    5/20/12   Initial release.   
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
	   Since this mod does not use any meshes, textures, or sounds from Morrowind, it is not
expected that it will be pulled down because of piracy accusations.

	   If you aren\'t smart enough to be able to read diary entries and complete quests that have
no quest objective markers, then you aren\'t smart enough to play this mod.  We are sorry.  There is
nothing we can do about your intelligence level.  Maybe you could drink a potion or something.

	   You say this mod is not lore friendly?  Lore friendly?  What is that?

	   Some of the screen shots show soul gems from a savegame using the mod \"Morrowind-Colored 
Soul Gems\"   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9033
     
	   This mod probably needs more play-testing.

	   If you locate a bug in this mod, contact David Brasher of Freddy the Noob\'s Mod Team
on TES Nexus so that the issue can be examined and hopefully fixed.	   
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits           
************************************************************************
Credits:  
	Freddy the Noob\'s Mod Team:
	   Freddy the Noob - Team Lead, Voice Actor
	   David Brasher - Questcoder/Scripter, Uploader/Caretaker
	   Clueless Punk - Object Placement/Misc. CK Work
	   SlothGirl - Playtester
	   DungeonCrawler - Playtester

	Bethesda for making Morrowind, the best Elder Scrolls game ever.
	Bethesda for making Skyrim, the worst Elder Scrolls game ever.
		
Copy Status:  Public domain with proper attribution and courtesy notification.  You may distribute
	this mod or mods you made using things from this mod as long as you give credit to the authors 
	and send notification to David Brasher on Skyrim Nexus stating that you have done this.      
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
author: Freddy the Noobs Mod Team
